basic_info.title: Skoltech University Scholarship 2024 in Russia (Fully Funded)
basic_info.author: Muhammad Saim Rasheed
basic_info.funded_by: Skoltech Institute of Science and Technology
basic_info.scholarships_available:
300 Seats for Masters
120 Seats for PhD
basic_info.deadline: 15th July 2024 for MSc, 5th 2024 July for PhD

program_details.description: Skoltech University offers a **fully funded scholarship** for international students. This is the best scholarship in Russia after the **Open Doors Russian Government Scholarship. **No** IELTS, GRE, or SAT is required—**no** Application Processing Fee. The Skoltech University Scholarship 2024 will cover the Full **Tuition** fee, **Medical** Insurance, a Monthly **Stipend** to cover living expenses, **accommodation** and a Free **Airfare** Ticket (Relocation Support).
participating_universities: Skoltech Institute of Science and Technology
subjects: Computational and Data Science and Engineering

financial_coverage: Total Tuition Fee will be covered by the University.

academic.minimum_degree_required: An appropriate Bachelor’s degree, or its equivalent, from a recognized university.

waiver_conditions: TOEFL or IELTS score is not required if the applicant received a university English-language degree.

additional_conditions: Submission of a General GRE score is not a requirement of the Skoltech application.
There are no minimum GPA requirements.

required_documents: If available: Diploma and/or current transcript
If available: Official TOEFL or IELTS results (if English is not the native language of the applicant)
If available: Official GRE scores (applications submitted with excellent GRE scores will increase the chance of acceptance)
